notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription:
The 22nd Fibonacci number is 17,711 and the 21st is 10,946. Show that the ratio of the 22nd and 21st Fibonacci numbers is approximately <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mo class="MJX-tex-mathit" mathvariant="italic">ϕ</mo>
    </mrow>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\mathit{ϕ}</annotation></semantics></math>. Round your answer to the nearest ten-thousandth.
